author: lundblad
msg: Fix encoding bug in diff output.
* libsvn_client/diff.c (file_printf_from_utf8): Recode the output to native
encoding rather than the APR path encoding. This was the intended behaviour

author: ghudson
msg: Clean up error leaks in mod_dav_svn.  With r10788 and friends, leaked
errors can result in an httpd crash at exit, because httpd runs the
global pool cleanup after unloading the svn module.  When the global
pool cleanup hits the error subpool, it tries to run a UTF8-related
dav_svn_set_headers, dav_svn_deliver): Clear errors if we're not
going to pass them to dav_svn_convert_err.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 2101.  When making a wc to wc copy of items with deleted=true
replace them with schedule=delete items.  This causes them to get deleted
when the copy is committed, thus reproducing the copy source in the
